job.title: Sr. Software Engineer - Embedded
job.description: pDo you want to design software for electric vehiclesnbspIf so and you enjoy working with a great small team of engineers we may have the job for youppnbspppWe are looking for a Senior Embedded Software Engineer to architect design code and debug realtime embedded firmware for electric motor controllersinvertersnbspppbrppstrongWhat youll dostrongppstrongnbspstrongpulliWork with motor control engineers to realize effective and efficient realtime software and control algorithmsliliFollow software development cycles including software requirements capture and verification of software to these requirementsliliParticipate in the preparation of development specificationsliliDesign setup and run tests to ensure the design meets specificationsliliDebug systems from prototypes development and customer returnsliulpnbsppulliProvide support to continuation engineering and other Curtis engineering teamsliliParticipate in software design electrical schematic and project reviewsliliWork within a small design team to complete assigned objectivesliliCollaborate with Curtis engineering sites around the worldliulpbrppstrongWe are interested in hearing from you if you possess the followingstrongppstrong strongpulliBachelors degree plus 5 years of experience in embedded realtime softwareliliExpert in realtime software programming using high level languagesliliExpert user of emulators incircuit testing and software debugging toolstechniquesliliExperience with serial communication protocols using CAN for example CANopen J1939 UDS etcliliKnowledge of realtime operating systems and task schedulersliulpnbspppstrongNice to havestrongppnbsppulliKnowledge of control and feedback systems for power and motor controlliliKnowledge of electronic circuits and implementationliliExperience with Modelbased design MBDliliExcellent interpersonal skillsliliEffective verbal and written communication skillsliulpp
